https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eeaTZU8Ous4BMDPIpc8uRvNVEAf.jpg Quite a bit can happen over the course of a single day in L.A., and when smooth-talking scam artist Johnny decides to throw a bachelor party for his best friend Bill the events of the day take a bizarre turn. As the festivities get underway, the appearance of a transvestite prostitute, a trigger-happy ex-con, and a notorious porn king signal that this isn't going to be a typical night out. American Crude
